text: This is a list of Latvian football transfers in the 2015 summer transfer window by club. Only transfers of the Virslīga are included. All transfers mentioned are shown in the references at the bottom of the page. If you wish to insert a transfer that isn't mentioned there, please add a reference. == Latvian Higher League == === Ventspils === In: Out: === Skonto === In: Out: === Jelgava === In: Out: === Liepāja === In: Out: === Spartaks === In: Out: === BFC Daugavpils === In: Out: === METTA/LU === In: Out: === Gulbene === In: Out: == References == == External links == * lff.lv * sportacentrs.com 2015 Latvia Football tansfers
title: List of Latvian football transfers summer 2015
